fields.description: Description of any errors that happened attempting to run the job
Description of the progress made by the job
The date/time the job was started
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
Key which indicates the function the job is performing
The date/time the job was initially scheduled
The current state of the job.
The last date/time properties of the job were updated

links.description: If the job is related to another item (like a project version), a link to that item. May also contain a label for the linked item
